kss_sleepiness.Description:
Please mark the number that best corresponds to how sleepy you feel <u>right now</u>. You may mark any number, but mark only one number.



1 = Extremely alert

2

3 = Alert

4

5 = Neither alert nor sleepy

6

7 = Sleepy - but no difficulty remaining awake

8

9 = Extremely sleepy - fighting sleep
